backtesting_approach:
1. Find stocks with 500%+ gains in ‚â§120 days via AUTOMATED GitHub Actions scan
2. Use 2-year chunks (7 parallel scans) to avoid GitHub Actions timeout
3. Deep dive into 180 days PRE-CATALYST for each stock
4. Analyze: price, volume, sentiment, leadership, news, patterns
5. Identify correlations between explosive stocks
6. Build screener based on correlations
7. Backtest on random historical dates
8. Apply FALSE MISS principle to discarded stocks
9. Track picks AND discards with full performance data
10. Refine until consistent 10-year performance
11. Store ALL data for future refinement
12. ALL VIA GITHUB ACTIONS - zero manual work except triggering
backtesting_progress:
PHASE 3A IN PROGRESS: üîÑ
- Workflow: safe_multi_year_scan_2year_chunks.yml
- Approach: 7 parallel 2-year scans (timeout-proof)
- Years: 2010-2011, 2012-2013, 2014-2015, 2016-2017, 2018-2019, 2022-2023, 2024
- COVID excluded: 2020-2021 (not scanning these years)
- Scan window: 120 days (4 months max to peak)
- Criteria: 500%+ gain in ‚â§120 days
- Expected results: ~1,200-1,500 total stocks ‚Üí ~800-1,100 sustainable
- Expected time: ~3 hours (all parallel)
- Safety: Each scan 2-3 hours max (50% under 6-hour limit)

LESSON LEARNED:
- Previous workflow used 3-4 year chunks
- 2013-2015 scan hit 6-hour GitHub Actions timeout
- Solution: 2-year chunks = guaranteed success

NEXT: Phase 3B - Analyze 180 days BEFORE each explosion

key_decisions: Mark all previous backtest results as UNVERIFIED
Clear all current portfolio positions - starting fresh
Build from verified data only - no fabrication
Use 500%+ in 120 days as explosive stock criteria (tightened from 180 days)
Analyze 180 days pre-catalyst for pattern discovery
Store all backtest data (picks AND discards) for refinement
Apply false miss principle in all backtests
User only does copy/paste - full automation required
Free data sources only (no paid APIs except Polygon)
Use GitHub Actions for full automation (no local execution)
Exclude 2020-2021 from pattern discovery (COVID-era market anomalies)
Use 2-year scan chunks to avoid GitHub Actions timeout (learned from 2013-2015 failure)
rules_established: NEVER fabricate data - verify or say you can't
FALSE MISS CHECK - Always check discarded stocks for explosive growth
STORE EVERYTHING - All decisions, data, refinements must be saved
COPY/PASTE ONLY - User should never manually enter data
10-YEAR VALIDATION - System must prove consistency before live trading
COVID-ERA EXCLUSION: Ignore 2020-2021 data (stimulus, zero rates, pandemic anomalies) - not repeatable conditions
TIMEOUT AWARENESS: GitHub Actions has 6-hour limit - use 2-year chunks for safety
